Package org.example.crmedu.domain.service

Interface BaseCrudService<T>

Type Parameters:
T - domain model for service
All Known Subinterfaces:
AttendanceService, LessonService, OrganizationService, StudentService, SubjectService, TutorService, UserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AttendanceServiceImpl, LessonServiceImpl, OrganizationServiceImpl, StudentServiceImpl, SubjectServiceImpl, TutorServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl
public interface BaseCrudService<T>
Base interface for service classes.

  • Method Details

    • create

      T create(T t)
      Creates a new object of T type.
      Parameters:
      t - the object to create
      Returns:
      the created BaseCrudService
      Throws:
      EntityExistsException - if object has constraints

    • findById

      T findById(Long id)
      Retrieves an object of type T by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the object T
      Returns:
      the found BaseCrudService
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no object with the given ID is found

    • findAll

      Page<T> findAll(int pageNumber, int pageSize)
      Retrieves a paginated list of objects T.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - the page number (starting from 0)
      pageSize - the number of objects T per page
      Returns:
      a Page containing the requested objects

    • update

      void update(T t, Long id)
      Updates an existing object.
      Parameters:
      t - the updated object data
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no user with the given ID is found
      EntityExistsException - if object has constraints

    • delete

      void delete(Long id)
      Deletes an object by its unique identifier.

      id - the unique identifier of the object to delete
